send_event_to_linked_units.description: [bool]If true, send switch events to linked units

error_loc_string.description: [string]Optional text string to appear when attempting to use a disabled switch

min_error_count.description: How many switches will be randomly set as broken (minimum)

max_error_count.description: How many switches will be randomly set as broken (maximum)

switch_type.description: The type of behavior for this switch

attached_to_linked_minigames.description: [bool]If true, the number of switches and their disabled state is based on the number of linked units with minigame components

error_audio_id.description: [string]Audio to play when error event is triggered
